channel.title: Open Source on Portfolio - Thomas Leroy
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Portfolio - Thomas Leroy

item.title: Teeworlds
item.description:
Teeworlds is 2D multiplayer open source game (available on Steam). Its development started around 10 years ago, I joined the main team recently to keep the work going. We released a new version (0.7.2) after years of hiatus. I’m currently working on remaking the editor from scratch (see below).
Album Progress album of the new editor
